meanings.slope: a surface of which one end or side is at a higher level than another
meanings.garden: a piece of ground adjoining a house, used for growing flowers, fruit, or vegetables
meanings.machete: a broad, heavy knife used as an implement or weapon
meanings.narrow: of small width in relation to length

meanings.persuade: induce someone to do something through reasoning or argument
meanings.remember: be able to bring to one's mind an awareness of someone or something from the past
meanings.hungry: feeling or showing the need for food
